Title: What About Love
Produced by:
Klaus Menzel 
 Nitsa Bechetrit 
 Sara Fijo 
 George Lascu 
 Bill Sloan
Starring:
Sharon Stone 
 Andy Garcia 
 Iain Glen 
 José Coronado 
 Maia Morgenstern
Production companies:
Eggplant Pictures 
 Quality Films 
 Accident Films 
 Gondola Films 
 Rex Media
Cast: Rosabell Laurenti Sellers as Young Girl
Miguel Ángel Muñoz as Christian Santiago
Release: What About Love was scheduled on February 14, 2020, but it was delayed to September 25, 2020, and then to February 12, 2021, but delayed again due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The film was released in the United States on February 14, 2024.
